testsuite.name: login.UsernameFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_loginUsernameAlpha Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username field for the Alphabetic characters" <u style="font-size:14px"><span style='color:dimgrey'>Test Steps: Alpha characters are allowed in the username text field TC_loginUsernameAlpha Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Username in the Login screen" Test Steps: Required error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the minimum character length" Test Steps: Username must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_loginUsernameSpecialChar Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username field for the Special characters" <u style="font-size:14px"><span style='color:dimgrey'>Test Steps: Special characters are allowed in the username text field TC_loginUsernameSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Username field Placeholder text in the Login screen" Test Steps: Username* text is displayed in the Username placeholder TC_loginUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: <span style='color:teal'>chrome Language: <span style='color:teal'>english Login Role: <span style='color:teal'>super admin TC_loginUsernameNumeric Testcase execution Started <em><b>"This method verifies Login screen Username field for the Numeric characters" <u style="font-size:14px"><span style='color:dimgrey'>Test Steps: Numeric characters are allowed in the username text field TC_loginUsernameNumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field by entering Spaces" Test Steps: Required error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the maximum character length" Test Steps: Username must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed
